.. homepage

MapThing
=================================
MapThing began life a simple JBA-customised map viewer.
It is now being redeveloped to function as an interactive data interrogation tool for catastrophe models. 

Here is screenshot of the current prototype. Exposures from a JCalf database are plotted on a map and clustered

.. figure:: _static/screenshot.png
    :scale: 50%


Support
-----------
For feedback and more information, please contact James Ramm: james.ramm@jbarisk.com
